alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Iowa; Johnson; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Buchanan, northwestern Johnson, eastern Benton, western Linn and northeastern Iowa Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walford, or 11 miles northeast of Marengo, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Rapids and Fairfax around 205 PM CDT. Atkins and Newhall around 210 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Palo, Shellsburg, Vinton, Center Point, Urbana, Walker and Brandon. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 32 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
